entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young boy who has just learned about his wizarding world and its money.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: A bank in the wizarding world where Harry's parents had left him a fortune. It is located in London.

entities.name: london
entities.description: The city where Gringotts bank is located.

entities.name: galleons
entities.description: A type of currency used in the wizarding world.

entities.name: sickles
entities.description: A type of currency used in the wizarding world.

entities.name: knuts
entities.description: A type of currency used in the wizarding world.

entities.name: muggle shops
entities.description: Stores that do not accept wizarding money.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: Harry's Muggle relatives who are afraid of magic.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: The mother of Ron and a kind person who is helping Harry.

relationships.description: Harry has a bank account at Gringotts.
Mrs Weasley is married to Arthur.
Harry is related to the Dursleys.
Harry is friends with Mrs Weasley.
